thread.title: Embassy Suites by Hilton Convention Center Las Vegas Complete Suite Upgrades
thread.title_full: Embassy Suites by Hilton Convention Center Las Vegas Complete Suite Upgrades

author: Cristina Lopez
title: Embassy Suites by Hilton Convention Center Las Vegas Complete Suite Upgrades
text:
The Embassy Suites by Hilton Convention Center Las Vegas hotel has just unveiled their new guest room upgrades, featuring new 2 queen sized beds instead of 2 double sized beds in each guest room. As part of the renovations, each guest room has brand new beds. General Manager, Tom Pugh, says “Our guests always compliment us on the comfort of our guestrooms; we can’t wait to upgrade everyone to even bigger beds for everyone’s comfort!” The Embassy Suites by Hilton Convention Center Las Vegas renovations were completed on August 17th.
About the Embassy Suites by Hilton Convention Center Las Vegas:
The Embassy Suites by HIlton Convention Center Las Vegas is a non-gaming hotel located near the famous Las Vegas Strip, and within walking distance to the monorail and Las Vegas Convention Center. The hotel provides guests with spacious two-room suites, complimentary made-to-order breakfast and complimentary beverages and snacks each night at the hotel's Evening Reception. Other hotel amenities include free guest parking, on-site Fountain Grill restaurant, indoor pool, outdoor sun deck, fitness center and business center. Guests enjoy all the comforts of home away from home and the convenience of being near the airport, the Las Vegas Convention Center, Sands Expo, and all of Las Vegas’ best shopping, dining and entertainment attractions. Over 11,000 square feet of event space is available to host events ranging from business meetings and conferences to weddings and receptions.
For more information visit: http://www.lasvegasembassysuites.com and connect with the hotel on Facebook by visiting facebook.com/ESCCLasVegas.
